name: slipring.github.io
body:
check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. 
page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually. support regular HTML content, support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.

can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
